Posts.Content: Apr 13, 2012 07:22AM sayoko7 wrote:  I agree with the button down tops as stated above.  Even reaching back to get into a jacket was difficult.  I ended up wearing a lot of my husbands Hawaiian shirts.  Short sleeves and lots of cheerful prints.  They were also baggy enough to hid the drains that I pinned to the zip front sports bra.
